sections.content:
Question:
Can RZ/V2H also be used in AI training?
Answer:
It is designed with a focus on AI inference in edge uses, and is not a processor for use in training. When beginning from AI training, the tool flow is to input neural networks trained using an AI framework such as a Linux PC or Pytorch into an RZ/V2H tool (AI SDK) in ONNX format.
Suitable Products
RZ/V2H
